Apart from a few bugs in the game, I really enjoy it. I love the playstyle of both survivor and killer and think its really well done, the idea of the game itself is really thought out. If you enjoy horror survival kind of games, I definitely recommend it! However, before getting the game, watch some YouTube videos to get a brief understanding about it and how to be good at it.

It is genuinely difficult to have a fun time playing this game.

Годная игра! Очень жаль, что начал в неё играть, когда все мои друзья уже на неё забили. За вполне условные 549 рублей получаешь отличную игру, в которую можно играть часами. Половину тех негативных отзывов, что я слышал, оказались ерундой. Однозначно рекомендую всем эту игру!
This game is so fucking good, I love this shit

Good game, only minor issues with matchmaking- (especially if you have poor wifi or inconsistent wifi) but it always seems to come through if you're patient. You can meet some good people on here, too. Thankfully handles voice chat well by having none!

From the "it sounded good on paper!"-department comes a game so frustrating that if frustration were a cure for cancer this game could cure itself.

Play Survivor if you like to be tortured.
Play Killer if you like to torture.
Thats it.

It might not quite be the horror game you are looking for but it's definetely a really original game with loads of content. I really enjoyed and still enjoy playing it and if you like these type of stuff definetely check it out.

This game is for sad people.  This game brings out a version of people you didn't know existed.

Dead by Daylight is a game that is not really balanced, the developers have prioritized the killer over the .survivor. 80% will make a map in favor of the killer if you don't intend to choose the map you want. I played with my friend 5 games, no one actively chose the map including the murderer.. but guess what, Dead by Daylight randomly appeared 5 maps that are beneficial to the murderer, of which 3 the map appears in a row.

While the killer is mostly Camper, Tunneler, good killers can only count on your fingers when playing this game

I suggest you do not recommend this game to your friends, because it is a stress game, not a relaxing game.
textures broken, hitboxes broken, lots of perks doesnt work. This game was good years ago, but update by update this game si biggest trash then before. Just wasting time, but try it, and youll see :)

I'm not really into horror games because I jump too easily, but this is the first asymmetric survival horror game that I've ever played and I love it.

You get to play either as a survivor in a team of four, or as a killer trying to hook all the survivors so they can't escape.

Best when played with friends, pretty sure you guys are gonna get hooked.
